channel.title: Pages on Aston's Programming Thoughts
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Aston's Programming Thoughts

item.title: About
item.description: In this blog, I post things that I implement or simply think, with the hope that they might help someone, or even inspire. function getmail() { var m = document.getElementById("laim").innerText.split("").reverse().join(""); document.getElementById("mailmelink").href="mailto:" + m; } Contact me if you have any suggestions or would like to give feedback. moc.liamnotorp@edocetibnotsa Simplicity is a great virtue but it requires hard work to achieve it and education to appreciate it. And to make matters worse: complexity sells better.
